message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850000. It's a great deal considering its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a profitable investment. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750000 is simply too low for me. Considering the product's worth and my own investment, I'm willing to come down to $825000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's still a great opportunity for you. Let's find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $825000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $775000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
